name: Realm Guardian
description:
Realm Guardian is a cube-style strategy game.
You will play a role in a fantasy world and become a lord, rule the land, and protect your people. Assign tasks to everyone. Gathering, hunting, farming, keep your people stay away from starving. Crafting, constructing, build a stronghold to resist the dead army.
You will start the game with six free folks, a flag -- a symbol of your reign, a cart -- stockpile, a campfire -- peasants will hang out around it when they are idle. A forager, a lumberjack, a craftman, a farmer, a miner, an infantry are recommended to be assigned with the first six. Build more shelters to support more settlers. Flagging more banners to enlarge the
population limit and expanding the territory. And then, show your creativity. Have fun and good luck.
